title: Episode 180: Dumb Phone with Donna Freitas
itunes:title: Episode 180: Dumb Phone with Donna Freitas
itunes:subtitle: Kate takes a cold plunge and Doree feels the post-vacation, post-book launch blues. Then, Donna Freitas, author of the recently released The Nine Lives of Rose Napolitano, joins them to talk about what it’s really like to not want children in your late...
description:
Kate takes a cold plunge and Doree feels the post-vacation, post-book launch blues. Then, Donna Freitas, author of the recently released The Nine Lives of Rose Napolitano, joins them to talk about what it’s really like to not want children in your late thirties, how she manages standing in lines without a smartphone, and why she keeps fresh flowers in her line of vision when she’s working. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:
